name: Heathen - s/t 7" (ltd color vinyl)
description:
Featuring current and ex members of Bracewar and Cast Aside, Heathen is not new to the game. This is their debut 7” following their demo tape on Rearranged records out of Belgium. It is 5 tracks of hateful, powerful, angry hardcore for fans of eyehategod, mind eraser, and other pissed off bands.

*we have added an extremely limited amount of the first pressing of this record. we found a few copies in a box hidden in the office.

name: Dead City - Goddamn The 21st Century
description: The extremely long awaited debut full length from Memphis, TN's DEAD CITY. Pre-orders will ship first of July Tracklisting: 1. Nasty Brutish Short 2. Saint of Killers 3. Lean Leaner Leanest 4. Sasahara 5. Granite Souls 6. Sabbath Lily 7. Leveler 8. Top of the Chain 9. Earth Rim Roamer 10. Carry The Fire 11. Goddamned listen here: www.myspace.com/deadcity from Aversionline "Because rather than falling back on all of the NY staples that everyone knows and loves, they're dirtying things up (in the best possible way) with more interesting and atypical influences more along the lines of what bands like Bloodlet and Cutthroat were doing "back in the day", right alongside some 1993 styled Entombed and Crowbar to add some texture and dimension. So the end result is still largely along the lines of early- to mid-90's "metalcore" (remember kids, it wasn't always a dirty word), but the fucking songwriting is far darker, more pissed, and more powerful than the vast majority of the bands out there right now reaping some serious benefits from the hype factor."

name: Moutheater - Ornament CD
description:
In the last year and a half, Moutheater has become known for their dark, twisted take on current aggressive music.  Mixing the sounds of past bands such as Tad, Nirvana, and The Melvins with the more modern elements of Cursed and His Hero is Gone and adding in their own flavor, "Ornament"can only be described as "self loathing, genre bending riff worship".


tracklist:
1. Swallowed Whole
2. The Big Breath Before the Deep Plunge
3. Inept*
4. The Center of the Universe
5. Negative Life
6. Guts*
7. Honesty
8. Obsolete Rhythm
9. Paths
10. Negative Death

*check out these tracks online:
www.myspace.com/moutheaterVA
www.myspace.com/thrashedrecords

name: Moutheater - Lot Lizard
description: Norfolk, VA’s Moutheater bring a heavy, noisy style of rock that takes no prisoners and doesn’t make any attempts to be pretty or melodic. They play a soundtrack to misery somewhat resembling The Jesus Lizard or The Melvins. engineered by steve albini (big black, shellac, nirvana). art by dwid hellion
